entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Terrace Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:32 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Bay 09:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

Humidity: 63 %

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Snow beginning before morning. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
